head.title: Baked Penne and Sun-Dried Tomato Sausage with Ricotta

ing.item: Links Aidells sun-dried tomato sausage; sliced

directions.step:
Preheat oven to 350Â° F. While pasta is cooking to al dente, heat olive oil in a skillet. Saute sausage 2 to 3 minutes. Add spinach and cook until wilted.
In a large mixing bowl combine sausage, spinach, tomatoes and ricotta. Mix pasta with other ingredients in a bowl. Adjust seasoning to taste. Place in a shallow baking dish and bake for 20 minutes or until cheese is bubbly.
Recipe by: Aidell's Sausage Company
